meanings.definition: A group of seven illustrious persons or things.
meanings.sent1: In our school play, a pleiad of talented actors performed on stage.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a pleiad of famous paintings by renowned artists.
meanings.sent3: At the party, a pleiad of clowns entertained the guests with their antics.
meanings.sent4: The team of superheroes formed a pleiad to protect the city from villains.
meanings.sent5: The library showcased a pleiad of rare books dating back centuries.

meanings.definition: A group of seven stars in the constellation Taurus.
meanings.sent1: Looking up at the night sky, I spotted a pleiad of bright stars in Taurus.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers study the pleiad in Taurus to understand more about the universe.
meanings.sent3: During the stargazing event, we marveled at the pleiad shining above us.
meanings.sent4: The ancient Greeks believed the pleiad in Taurus were sisters transformed into stars.
meanings.sent5: The folklore of many cultures includes stories about the pleiad and their significance.
